    Flower

    A song released by The Oral Cigarettes in 2017 under the album "Black Memory".

    Click on any section to learn more about it. Follows line by line from Spotify.

    きつく眩しい太陽の下
     Kitsuku mabushii taiyou no shita
     Under the harsh, dazzling sun...
    Original
    Romanized
    English
    きつく
    kitsuku
    harshly; severely
    眩しい
    mabushii
    dazzling; bright
    太陽
    taiyou
    sun
    の
    no
    -possessive particle-
    下
    shita
    beneath, under
    くらむ眼を見開いて
     Kuramu me wo mihiraite
     I open my blurred eyes.
    Original
    Romanized
    English
    くらむ
    kuramu
    to blur; to become dizzy
    眼
    me
    eye; eyes
    を
    wo
    -object marker-
    見開いて
    mihiraite
    to open (wide); to open one's eyes
    空の青と馴染むあなたの眼に
     Sora no ao to najimu anata no me ni
     In your eyes, blending with the blue of the sky...
    Original
    Romanized
    English
    空
    sora
    sky
    の
    no
    -possessive particle-
    青
    ao
    blue
    と
    to
    -connect words (and, with)-
    馴染む
    najimu
    to fit in, to become familiar with
    あなた
    anata
    you
    の
    no
    -possessive particle-
    眼
    me
    eye; eyes
    に
    ni
    -indirect object marker (to, for)-
    吸い込まれそうさ
     Suikomaresou sa
     It feels like I'm being drawn in.
    Original
